allow:
Bash(gh release create v1.0.0 --title "CivicTechWR Project Template v1.0.0" --notes "$(cat <<''EOF''
## CivicTechWR Project Template v1.0.0

First stable release of the comprehensive CivicTechWR project template.

### âœ¨ Features

- **DVF Framework Integration** - Complete scoring system with 4 assessment lenses
- **12-Week Project Lifecycle** - Documentation and templates for full season

- **Security Best Practices** - Repository configuration and civic tech data protection guidelines
- **Project Management Templates** - Pitch, technical design, user research, and Demo Day preparation
- **Automated Workflows** - Validation, maintenance, and security monitoring

### ðŸš€ Getting Started

1. Use this template to create a new repository
2. Follow the [Getting Started Guide](https://civictechwr.github.io/CTWR-Project-Template-New/)
3. Complete your DVF Assessment to score your project
4. Begin your 12-week project journey!

### ðŸ“š Documentation

- **Live Documentation**: https://civictechwr.github.io/CTWR-Project-Template-New/
- **DVF Scorecard**: Evaluate across Community Partner, Talent & Team, Technical, and Civic dimensions
- **Complete Templates**: Everything needed for successful civic tech projects

This template provides everything needed for successful CivicTechWR projects following our proven framework.
EOF
)")
